intro: The vRack Services product allows you to benefit from network services on the vRack. By creating a Service Endpoint, you can expose a service managed by OVHcloud on your vRack using a private IP address.
title: You have not yet activated vRack Services
description: To benefit from the services, you must activate and configure vRack Services.
guide1Title: Create a Service Endpoint with Netapp
guide1Description: Find out how to configure vRack Services to expose your Netapp service on your vRack
guide2Description: Discover the vRack Services product and associated services
